summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED THE SAME PROBLEM AS STATED IN RECALL#98V009000 HEADLIGHT, HOWEVER THE DEALER REFUSED TO REPAIR, BECAUSE THE VEHICLE IDENTIFICATION WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  *JB   THE BURNED PLUGS AND MELTED CONTACT SOCKETS WERE REPLACED.  THE HEAD LAMP WOULD GO OF AND ON WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION.  *SCC
